name: Mitsubishi Hitachi Power Systems Europe GmbH
bossPosition: Senior VP Energy Solutions & New Products
goal:
MHPSE, a subsidiary of globally operating MHPS Ltd.,
has a cumulative 100+ year track record in the power plant sector, advancing our technical ability to develop reliable high quality products, improving our comprehensive engineering ability that is capable of handling projects in various regions around the world.

With key office locations based in the EMEA region, the European group has a workforce of approximately 1,200.

For more information: www.emea.mhps.com/en/
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Budget, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Customs, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Energy, Enlargement, Environment, External Relations, Institutional affairs, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives:
- Energy Union;
- Project financing mechanisms;
- Single energy market;
- Horizon 2020 & Horizon Europe;
- Climate and Energy policy Framework, e.g. Clean Energy Package;
- BREFs under the IED;
- Air quality policy;
- Decarbonisation of the Transport Sector & Alternative Fuels;
- AI and IoT Solutions.
